greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If the final digit of n in base 3 is the same as a([n/3]) then this digit, otherwise a(n)= mod 3-sum of these two digits, with a(0)=0.
link: Index entries for sequences related to final digits of numbers
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 04 2001
